meta.title: Contact TmpMail Team - Technical Support, Feedback, Business Cooperation
meta.description: Contact the TmpMail team for technical support, feedback, or cooperation inquiries. We provide multiple contact methods and respond quickly to user needs. For temporary email issues, feature suggestions, or business cooperation, feel free to contact us anytime.

subtitle: Have questions or suggestions? We'd love to hear from you

hero.title: Contact Us
hero.subtitle: Have questions or suggestions? We'd love to hear from you

success.title: Message Sent Successfully!
success.message: Thank you for contacting us. We have received your message and will reply within 24 hours. For urgent issues, please email directly to heyjude1817@gmail.com.

form.title: Send Message
form.description: Please fill out the form below and we'll get back to you soon

message.label: Message
message.placeholder: Please describe your question, suggestion, or request in detail...
